top10.summary: Apple plans to transform Siri into a chatbot, similar to ChatGPT, with the expected launch integrated into iOS 27. The revamped Siri, codenamed "Campos," will support both voice and text inputs, marking a strategic shift due to competitive pressure. Apple has chosen Google's Gemini as its AI partner after evaluating options like OpenAI and Anthropic.
top10.ai_rundown: 蘋果 Siri 迎來重大轉型。這款代號「Campos」的類 ChatGPT 機器人將支援語音與文字互動，預計於明年 WWDC 亮相。面對競爭壓力，蘋果決定調整策略，聯手 Google 搶回 AI 主導權。
top10.title: Apple plans to make Siri an AI chatbot

top10.summary: Notion is expanding its Custom Agent platform to include Slack integration and plans for Calendar and Mail connectors for automation. Integrations with third-party services like Cursor, Linear, and Ramp are in development, enhancing project management and finance tasks. New sections like Feed, Library, and Workers will enable developers to create custom integrations, while AI features like an AI co-editor enhance productivity.
top10.ai_rundown: Notion 正在轉型為 AI 自動化中樞。透過 MCP 與 Workers 框架並測試「電腦操作」功能，讓 AI 代理能跨工具執行複雜任務。
top10.title: Notion working on custom MCPs, Workers, and Computer Use

top10.summary: OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, has been meeting with investors in the Middle East to line up funding for a new investment round that could total at least $50 billion. He recently visited the region, where he spoke with some of the leading state-backed funds in Abu Dhabi. The talks are early, and the amount could change. OpenAI has also recently held talks with Amazon to raise at least $10 billion.
top10.ai_rundown: OpenAI 擬籌 500 億美元。執行長 Altman 接洽中東投資人以擴大算力設施，這將再次拉高 AI 融資天花板。
top10.title: OpenAI's Altman Meets Mideast Investors for $50 Billion Round

top10.summary: Pass@k is the probability that at least one of k different attempts will succeed. It is one of the most common metrics used for agents. The problem with the metric is that it's exponentially forgiving, and humans interacting with agents aren't nearly that forgiving. Pass@k should be a metric that's rarely used, and carefully justified every time it is used.
top10.ai_rundown: 別被 AI 指標誤導！軟體工程師 Brooker 指出 Pass@k 數據過於寬容，無法反映真實使用者體驗，呼籲開發者應審慎衡量並減少使用此指標。
top10.title: Pass@k is Mostly Bunk

top10.summary: Anthropic has published a new constitution for Claude. The document is a detailed description of Anthropic's vision for Claude's values and behavior that explains the context in which Claude operates and the kind of entity the company would like Claude to be. The constitution is a crucial part of the model training process, and its content directly shapes Claude's behavior. This post describes what's included in the new constitution and some of the considerations that informed Anthropic's approach.
top10.ai_rundown: Anthropic 發布 Claude 新憲法。該文件採 CC0 授權，是規範模型行為的最高準則，旨在透過提升透明度，強化 AI 處理複雜倫理與安全議題的一致性。
top10.title: Claude's new constitution

top10.summary: Meta's new artificial intelligence lab has delivered its first high-profile models internally. The company's CTO, Andrew Bosworth, says the models show a lot of promise. There is still a tremendous amount of work required in the post-training phase before the models can be delivered in a way that's usable internally and by consumers. Meta is starting to see favorable returns from its big gambits in 2025. The next two years will be important for bringing consumer products to market.
top10.ai_rundown: Meta 內部 AI 研發取得關鍵進展。CTO 證實新團隊已交付首批高效能模型，雖仍需後訓練優化，但潛力龐大。這標誌著其 2025 年的長期佈局正轉向實質產品收割期。
top10.title: Meta's new AI team delivered first key models internally this month, CTO says

top10.summary: Apple's strategy focuses on its durable ecosystem, prioritizing hardware sales over AI innovations, despite the industry's AI investment focus.
top10.ai_rundown: 蘋果以逸待勞，憑藉生態系韌性應對 AI 泡沫。即便當前技術進度較慢，專家預測其強大的硬體分發能力將使其在 2026 年市場修正後反超同業。
top10.title: Apple vs. the AI Hype Cycle

top10.summary: When the Model Context Protocol (MCP) exploded a year ago, everyone rushed to build MCP servers. A year later, most MCP servers disappoint. While developers blame the protocol, enterprise adoption tells a different story. Companies are deploying MCP servers, and integrations are live. This post breaks down why MCP servers fail, best practices for building ones that work, and how Skills and MCP complement each other.
top10.ai_rundown: MCP 沒問題，是你的開發邏輯錯了。開發者應將 MCP 視為 AI 的「介面」而非 API，採取結果導向設計以減少幻覺並節省 Token，避免過於瑣碎的工具調用。
top10.title: MCP is Not the Problem, It's your Server: Best Practices for Building MCP Servers

top10.summary: Aliisa Rosenthal, OpenAI's former sales leader, emphasizes context engineering as a key advantage, particularly in enterprise applications, and advocates for developing lighter, cost-effective models.
top10.ai_rundown: OpenAI 前銷售主管轉戰創投！Aliisa Rosenthal 加入 Acrew Capital，助新創透過「專業化」與「上下文圖譜」建立護城河，抗衡模型巨頭。
top10.title: OpenAI's former sales leader joins VC firm Acrew: OpenAI taught her where startups can build a ‘moat'

top10.summary: Devin Review is a code review tool that uses AI and UX to scale human understanding of complex code diffs. It is currently free and works on any public or private GitHub PR. The tool helps in every step of the PR process. It allows developers to chat about changes without leaving the review.
top10.ai_rundown: Cognition 推出 Devin Review，以 AI 邏輯分組與對話解決 PR 瓶頸，助開發者掌握複雜異動，杜絕低質代碼。
top10.title: Devin Review: AI to Stop Slop

daily_briefing.key_takeaways: 涵蓋 Apple 產品轉型、OpenAI 融資進展及 Notion 與 Claude 的最新動態。
